items.value: The bandits are increasing their defensive army.
%113% distracted the bandits with liquor so they ended up forgetting that they were supposed to form a new defensive army unit.
%113% failed to distract the bandits. A new %111% %112% have been formed at the camp.
%113% managed to convince the bandit's leader to give their new %111% %112% unit to us.
%113% will not intervene with the bandits.
%113% stopped %01@ from producing a new army unit.
